==Halliburton in the media==
==Halliburton in the media==
* ''[[Iraq for Sale: The War Profiteers]]'' is a 2006 documentary by [[Robert Greenwald]].
* ''[[Iraq for Sale: The War Profiteers]]'' is a 2006 documentary by [[Robert Greenwald]].
â
* In [[Marvel Comic]]'s ''[[Fantastic Four]]'' Halliburton has received many of the [[no-bid contract]]s for the repair of the [[Baxter Building]]. [[Reed Richards]] said that they overcharged for the work.
+
* In [[Marvel Comic]]'s ''[[Fantastic Four]]'' Halliburton has received many of the [[no-bid contract]]s for the repair of the [[Baxter Building]]. [[Reed Richards]] said that they overcharged for the work.<ref name="Fantastic Four 542">{{cite journal |quotes= |last=McDuffie |first=Dwayne |authorlink=Dwayne McDuffie |coauthors=[[Mike McKone]] |year=2007 |month=January |title= |journal=[[Fantastic Four]] |volume= |issue=541 |pages= |id= |url= |accessdate= }}</ref>
* ''Mass Destruction'' by [[Faithless]] features the line: "whether Haliburton, [[Enron]] or anyone, greed is a weapon of mass destruction."
* ''Mass Destruction'' by [[Faithless]] features the line: "whether Haliburton, [[Enron]] or anyone, greed is a weapon of mass destruction."
